name: The Quiet Bean Cafe
description: Cozy cafe with excellent coffee and free Wi-Fi. Perfect for focused work.

name: Central City Library
description: Spacious library with quiet study rooms and public computers.

name: Innovate Hub Coworking
description: Modern coworking space with meeting rooms and hot desks. Requires membership.

name: The Daily Grind
description: Popular spot with strong espresso and outdoor seating. Can get busy.

name: Community Study Center
description: Quiet community center with dedicated study areas. Limited power outlets.
